com.flowpowered.react.collision.broadphase

Class PairManager.BodyPair

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.react.collision.broadphase.PairManager.BodyPair
  • Enclosing class:
    PairManager

    public static class PairManager.BodyPair
extends Object
    Represents a pair of bodies during the broad-phase collision detection.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      BodyPair()
      Default constructor.
      BodyPair(CollisionBody body1, CollisionBody body2)
      Constructs a new body pair from the first and second body.
